job_history.work_description: To provide comprehensive occupational and environmental health services including but not limited to occupational medicine, industrial hygiene, industrial safety and administrative tasks. Assessment of all injuries or illness, first aid, CPR, and emergency treatment to all employees and guests. Educate about basic health care, prevent heath issues, monitor the health condition of the employees, dispense medication(s); train and support other staff members and manage the health risks within the facility.

Assisted the physicians in all aspects of patient care. Assessed and prioritized each incoming patient telephone call and advise them in basic treatment or recommend seeking immediate care in a local hospital, ER, or assisted them with scheduling an office visit.

Performed a comprehensive range of clinical functions in the home setting within the community. Assessed patients' developmental stages and conditions, administered medications, maintained patient charts/care plans and responded to medical emergencies.

skills.name: Occupational Health
skills.explanation: Provided comprehensive occupational and environmental health services, including assessment of injuries or illnesses, first aid, CPR, and emergency treatment, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Nursing
skills.explanation: Over two decades of experience in various nursing roles, including home healthcare, physician liaison, and occupational health nurse coordinator, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Patient Assessment
skills.explanation: Assessed patients' developmental stages and conditions, and prioritized incoming patient telephone calls, suggesting strong proficiency in patient assessment.

skills.name: Medication Administration
skills.explanation: Administered medications in various healthcare settings, including home healthcare and occupational health, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Emergency Response
skills.explanation: Provided emergency treatment, including CPR, and responded to medical emergencies in various healthcare settings, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Health Education
skills.explanation: Educated patients about basic healthcare and prevented health issues, showing a solid working proficiency in health education.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed health risks within a facility and supported other staff members, indicating some practical experience in leadership.
